articles.description: Was Manchester United's stunning FA Cup win over Manchester United at Wembley manager Erik ten Hag's farewell?
articles.title: Was Manchester United's FA Cup win Erik ten Hag's farewell?

articles.description: Jofra Archer takes two wickets in his first international for more than a year as England begin their World Cup preparations with a 23-run victory over Pakistan in the second T20 at Edgbaston.
articles.title: England v Pakistan T20 international: Jofra Archer takes two wickets as hosts win at Edgbaston

articles.description: Toulouse captain Antoine Dupont is described as a 'ball-stealing machine' after starring in his side's Champions Cup final win over Leinster.
articles.title: Antoine Dupont: Toulouse captain inspires team to Champions Cup final glory

articles.description: US golfer Grayson Murray has died at the age of 30, the PGA Tour announces.
articles.title: Grayson Murray: American PGA Tour player dies aged 30

articles.description: Charles Leclerc said after taking pole position for the Monaco Grand Prix that he had dreamt of winning his home race “since being a kid”.
articles.title: 'Charles Leclerc prepares to fulfil childhood Monaco dream'

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe ends his Paris St-Germain career with a French Cup final win over Lyon as Luis Enrique's side complete the domestic double.
articles.title: Lyon 1-2 Paris St-Germain: Kylian Mbappe wins French Cup in farewell appearance

articles.description: Barcelona will 'go down in history' after defending their Women's Champions League title, says England defender Lucy Bronze.
articles.title: Women's Champions League final: Barcelona 'will go down in history', says England's Lucy Bronze

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola admits he made a "mistake" with his tactics in their 2-1 FA Cup final defeat by Manchester United.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Manchester City boss says he made FA Cup final tactical mistakes

articles.description: Follow live text coverage and listen to radio commentary as Josh Taylor and Jack Catterall meet in light-welterweight rematch in Leeds.
articles.title: Josh Taylor v Jack Catterall 2 - live text - BBC Sport

articles.description: Rangers might have played well, but Celtic showed them how to get the job done again at Hampden, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Celtic 1-0 Rangers: 'Scottish Cup final shows difference in Old Firm'
